title: Elegant Four-Bedroom Apartment Overlooking Historic Rynek
description: Step into a luxurious sanctuary in the heart of Kazimierz Dolny, just off the iconic Rynek. This meticulously appointed apartment offers four spacious bedrooms, a modern bathroom, and a bright, expansive layout spanning 138 sqm. Features include a private terrace with breathtaking mountain views, an ensuite master bedroom, and premium fixtures throughout. A full-sized laundry room and a dedicated storage locker ensure comfort and convenience.
neighborhood_description: Live amidst the picturesque charm of Kazimierz Dolny’s most celebrated square. Boutique shopping, artisanal dining, and vibrant galleries are just steps from your door, while lush parks and riverside walking paths fringe the neighborhood, inviting leisurely days and evening relaxation. Set in a tranquil, low-urban enclave, residents enjoy beautiful natural scenery without sacrificing cultural vibrancy.
lifestyle_benefits: minutes to art galleries and fine dining
nestled on a quiet historic square
target_buyer: Perfect for expats seeking culture, tranquility, and a vibrant social scene, with an appreciation for luxury living in Poland’s prime historic locale.
market_positioning: A rare offering at the top of the Kazimierz Dolny market, this residence delivers unmatched refinement and exclusivity for discerning international buyers.
